  html_document:

```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
actionButton("add", "Add")
```

```{r}
counter = reactiveValues(counter_value = 0) 
observeEvent(input$add, { counter$counter_value = counter$counter_value + 1})
```

```{r}
renderPlot({
    data = data.frame(counter=counter$counter_value)
    ggplot(data) + geom_bar()
    # barplot(counter)
})
```
